original_title: 大河向东流之沁源故事
overview: The film mainly tells the story of the village party branch secretary Guo Dahe who has been fighting on the front line of poverty alleviation for many years. After graduation from university, his daughter Guo Xiaohe returned to the countryside with advanced ideas and advanced concepts. The father and daughter fought side by side on the road of poverty alleviation and moved forward. s story.
title: Qinyuan Story of the Great River Flowing East
